caption:
Manchester United are not just ending Ruben Amorim’s career but they also ended up ruining Sporting CP’s season... 🥲💔⬇️

Before joining Man United, Ruben Amorim hadn’t lost a game in over a year. He was having the greatest start to a season in Sporting’s history — they even destroyed Man City in the UCL and looked absolutely UNSTOPPABLE.

And then came Manchester United...

🗣️ Ruben Amorim: “I wanted to stay at Sporting until the end of the season, but Man Utd told me it was not possible. I was told it was now or never, or they would go for another option.”

Amorim has gone from getting ‘Best Manager in the World’ to ‘Worst Manager in the World’ shouts in the same season — all thanks to Manchester United.

Manchester United have gone from being the “NIGHTMARE” of opponents to becoming the “NIGHTMARE” for their own fans... 💔
